title: Ukraine Moves Forward in South, With Little Resistance From Russia
description: A day after Russia said it was withdrawing from Kherson City in the south, Ukraineâ€™s forces moved into villages without a fight, indicating the Russians were, indeed, retreating.
dc:creator: Andrew E. Kramer
media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:description: A Ukrainian woman wept on Thursday after Ukrainian soldiers entered the village of Snihurivka, which had been occupied by Russian soldiers.
